summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.9°C) and outside temperature (down 11.6°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11556 lux) and cloud levels (up 375 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15853 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 259 m), and outside humidity (down 7%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and slight breezes. Drizzle or light rain possible, fog or low cloud is expected, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. The weather will likely remain the same.
